name: Telephone Address
description: The TA data type is used to represent telephone contact information with structured components for different types of telephone communication. It provides a way to specify telephone numbers along with their type and use codes, enabling healthcare systems to maintain organized contact information for patients, providers, and other healthcare entities. TA has been largely superseded by XTN (Extended Telecommunications Number) in later HL7 versions but remains important for backward compatibility.

TA.1.name: Telephone Number
TA.1.description: The actual telephone number in standard format. Contains the phone number that can be dialed to reach the contact.

TA.2.name: Telecommunication Use Code
TA.2.description: Indicates the intended use or purpose of the telephone number (e.g., home, work, emergency). Specifies when and how the number should be used.

TA.3.name: Telecommunication Equipment Type
TA.3.description: Specifies the type of telecommunications equipment or service (e.g., phone, fax, pager, cellular). Indicates the communication method and capabilities.

constraints.useCode: Telecommunication use code should reference valid values from table 0201
constraints.equipmentType: Equipment type should reference valid values from table 0202
constraints.phoneFormat: Telephone number should follow standard formatting conventions
